# Preamble

## Introduction

## Dependencies

```{r load-libs}
library(OSTA.data)
library(SpatialExperiment)
library(SpatialExperimentIO)
```

```{r load-data, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# retrieve Xenium dataset
id <- "Xenium_HumanColon_Oliveria"
pa <- OSTA.data_load(id)
dir.create(td <- tempfile())
unzip(pa, exdir=td)
(spe <- readXeniumSXE(td))
# crop for demo
xy <- spatialCoords(spe)
spe <- spe[, 
    xy[,1]>1500 & xy[,1]<2000 & 
    xy[,2]<1700 & xy[,2]>1200 ]
```

# Centroids

```{r}
devtools::load_all()
miro(spe, 
    xy=TRUE,
    pol=p,
    pol_aes=list(size=0.1),
    dat_aes=list(col="cell_area", size=0.2))
```

# Polygons

```{r}
devtools::load_all()
p <- "cell_boundaries"
m <- "transcripts"
miro(spe, pol=p, f="cell_area")
```

# Molecules

```{r fig.height=3.5, fig.width=4}
miro(spe, 
    dat_aes=list(size=0.2),
    f="red", #c="black",
    #pol=p, pol_aes=list(size=0.1),
    # mol=m, mol_aes=list(size=0.1),
    # keys=c("VWF", "EGFR", "PECAM1"),
    mol_pal=c("gold", "cyan", "magenta"))
```
